outputs.output_descr: This project aims to promote knowledge and awareness in Human Development in oPt.  The present project is part of a multi-phased programme designed for advocacy in oPt which will lead to the production of the sixth NHDR, advocacy for human development, the production of series of policy and position paper on the status of development , and finally the production of quarterly surveys on Palestinians perceptions on their living conditions.  The programme will lead to identifying priorities for policy, analysing emerging trends, collecting and processing data, and advocating for human development. It has as its main goal the promotion of national dialogue,  and identification of development alternatives that impact development in oPt.  The NHDR project will be implemented in three tracks. The first track involves the preparation of the NHDR itself, the second track will cover the carrying out of the quarterly surveys on perceptions and the production of Human Development materials and the third track covers the programme management support.

project_descr: This project aims to promote knowledge and awareness in Human Development in oPt.  It is part of a multi-phased programme designed for advocacy in oPt as per UNDP's contribution to setting the development agenda and supporting development debate.
